Reviews.Title: “Little modern gem in central Paris”

Reviews.Content: modern comfort hotel amenities restaurant pool mainly building looks inside street close de la république welcoming staff internationally oriented fluent english decent terms size modern offer sleeping showering wellkept hotel bright atmosphere reasons possibility pay credit card checking staff bit hurry reception 24 hours services including free wifi available stayed negative comments

Reviews.Title: “Smart, friendly hotel in great location”
Reviews.Author: Julianne M
Reviews.Content: friend booked hotel idea expect reasonable price pleasantly surprised hotel central walking distance metro stations decor bright modern funky staff friendly helpful language issues encountered didnt hotel breakfast authentic breakfast experience loads cafes walking distance caught short happily recommend

Reviews.Title: “Cute little hotel in a good location”
Reviews.Author: Georgina N
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights july 2011 found hotel hard republique metro station five minute brisk walk difficult suitcases clean tidy expected paris staff nice helpful night staff rude breakfast overall funky little hotel

Reviews.Title: “Bed Bugs”
Reviews.Author: paris t
Reviews.Content: arrival loved hotel staff extremely helpful night woke bitten 28 times appeared bed bugs able confirm visiting pharmacy examining bed moved hotels little explanation management avaliable discuss matter hotel email heard incident effectively ruined rest holiday recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “victim of its success”
Reviews.Author: Christophemallorca
Reviews.Content: times hotel time disappoint 1 price 30 expensive depending deal started 2 ago price options paris especially considering basic 2 internet biggest joke wifi properly hotel single time wifi properly argument smile tried changed result wifi totally unreliable 2 minutes 20 minutes mornings bit business trip forget hotel 3 breakfast breakfast supposed 11 am sunday stay 1030 am table available receptionist friendly admittedly quickly fixed realized food left price 12 euro finding coffee shop nearby breakfast overall disappointing times paris hotels time try am

Reviews.Title: “Very central to everything”
Reviews.Author: Robyn L
Reviews.Content: hotel position quiet street short cab ride tourist paris staff friendly helpful directions nice eat recommend traveller

Reviews.Title: “Nice boutique hotel in Republique area of Paris”
Reviews.Author: gooddog6
Reviews.Content: hotel friendly helpful staff front desk people spoke english beautifully hotel bit easy access public transportation major sites clean noisy construction door liked amenities

Reviews.Title: “We'd stay there again”
Reviews.Author: brendan c
Reviews.Content: staff friendly helpful spoke english clean quiet bed comfortable location walked time 1520 minutes seine notre dame pompidou etc didnt breakfast €12 lot relative paris prices theres boulangerie corner towards oberkampf metro recommend strolling past metro station onto rue du temple heading towards river streets cafes quirky shops improved sized bath tea coffee facilities nice pay comfortable clean friendly hotel id stay

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Sued0t
Reviews.Content: stay pleasant located hotel minutes walk metro bakery dry cleaners laundromat grocery store close fruit vegetable market perfect base explore paris middle tourist town breakfast downstairs lovely lots cafes closeby note tea coffee facilities fridge

Reviews.Title: “A bit small & bit expensive”
Reviews.Author: Osseja_01
Reviews.Content: hotel fine nice looking items space price travel travel couples hang suit coat forget makes remember film form max brothers beds price cheap nice proposals hotels breakfast charged addition price hotel expensive wifi fine hotel modern

Reviews.Title: “Lovely area”
Reviews.Author: DashaNova
Reviews.Content: love hotel charming saint denis canal steps plenty evening probably comers paris central perfect leisurely weekend hotel clean quirky helpful english speaking staff

Reviews.Title: “Loved this Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Bman32
Reviews.Content: hotel quiet street nice presentation outside lobby staff extremely friendly welcoming discovered initial fourth floor hadnt cleaned immediately switched fifth floor balcony difference giving excellent recommendation stayed triple fairly triple comparison stayed balcony provided added space relaxing sit balcony enjoy beautiful view bathroom nice modern hairdryer included washcloths refrigerator safe closet internet connection perfect staff offered own computer try check flight online staff spoke english difficult times due elevator bit slow actually enjoyed alternative spiral staircase immensely bit misunderstanding taxi arrangements staff night told 45 euro staff arranged taxi morning set upscale taxi 55 euro late change time realized error

Reviews.Title: “Great Little "Parisienne" Hotel”
Reviews.Author: yahooholidays
Reviews.Content: it’s hotel close republic metro station there’s helpful guy reception bar restaurant plenty restaurants bars supermarket immediate surrounding safe hours morning comfortable clean modern nicely decorated parisienne theme flat panel tv air conditioning fridge contents safe that’s sized laptop wifi free fast voip calls staff pleasant helpful efficient croissants fruit reception nice touch didn’t breakfast can’t comment stay paris hotel actually thoughtful touches offered value money stay

Reviews.Title: “Perfect hotel in a great location”
Reviews.Author: roby_swiss
Reviews.Content: modern hotel quiet clean confortable designed near hotel metro stations bar boulangerie breakfast enjoyed hotel recommend time stay

Reviews.Title: “Best Paris Experience Ever”
Reviews.Author: WHHH
Reviews.Content: 4 stayed 20 hotels paris 3 5 star pity discovered le 20 prieure location metro station republique perfect leisure business tasteful quiet clean leads value price relation entire staff providing friendly service thats hard paris hotel comfortable

Reviews.Title: “" Noise from Hotel ruined my trip"”
Reviews.Author: DDL72
Reviews.Content: advanced booking november 2010 week’s stay february 2011 le 20 prieure hotel requested quiet arrival discovered request ignored 101 floor fire exit 5th day stay light breakfast 730am returned 815am rest 815am surprise heard noise pertaining nature banging pipes scraping walls drilling talking noise emanated fire exit following morning noise occurred noise started feel distress decided manager benoit director front desk staff alex alex looked saying claimed aware carried refused listen claimed hotel booked couldn’t leave reception returned reception time spoke alex persistent noise wouldn’t allow relax sleep time told banging hear central heating distressed time complaint manager benoit appeared arrogant told noise heard coming hotel admitted noise coming hotel start 915 am manager noise occurring 5th 6th day received apology insist manager witness noise moved manager owner’s details told deals complaints time stay le 20 prieure hotel definitely recommend hotel traveller experienced unpleasant dealing people

Reviews.Title: “A hidden gem in Republique area”
Reviews.Author: jscHongKong
Reviews.Content: impressed discreet beautifully styled hotel staff helpful helped check flight online designed bed comfortable bathroom functioned buffet breakfast definitely return offered incredible value

Reviews.Title: “Le 20 Prieure made my trip a even better trip”
Reviews.Author: CCLovetravel
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel le 20 prieure leisure trip liked hotel spacious standard clean booked hotel able enjoy bird price price affordable charming quiet hotel location easy nice bakery supermarket restaurants morning market corner impressed attentive staff friendly helpful cheerful

Reviews.Title: “A Good Rest- under the "Eiffel Tower." !”
Reviews.Author: Mr. Matt
Reviews.Content: yes headboard beds wall sized photo eiffel tower hotel quiet street republic near metro stops nice variety typical parisian shops nearby clean sized paris hotel standards bathroom roomy uptodate fixtures buffet breakfast adequate attentive service finally english speaking frontdesk staff meet request succeed thanks le 20 prieure highly reccomended

Reviews.Title: “Great, stylish little hotel”
Reviews.Author: Jaipurjane
Reviews.Content: paris le prieure 20 stylish recently refurbished carpets bedding curtains fresh bathroom fittings modern wonderfully designed space loved view rooftops paris romantic poetic reception art trendy staff lovely helpful

Reviews.Title: “A little gem - fabulous hotel in an amazing location!”
Reviews.Author: MPC28
Reviews.Content: real granted wasnt huge clean wellappointed fab artwork bathroon generous size lovely fittings staff desk helpful location perfect short walk canal st martin bastille neighbourhood cafe bars restaurants im looking forward visit

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: MisterMoo2
Reviews.Content: stayed nov 2010 2 friends triple 3rd floor hotel clean location price paris standards 2 double windows onto street quiet heard tvs guests walked marais day 15 mins walk du temple metro stops 3 mins walk breakfast €12 worth buying hungry buffet juices fresh juice machine fresh fruit including strawberries raspberries days filter coffee nespresso chocolate ham selection cheeses tomatoes yoghurts eggs egg boiler baguettes croissants butter selection jams pain au tables cleared regularly buffet replenished constantly coffee bread basket paris hotels staff friendly negative lift didnt sometimes huge stairs wide bright easy access

Reviews.Content: return trip paris hotel clean recently renovated looks exactly photos hotel site staff friendly troubles communicating english cut trip short hotel able accommodate plans penalties close tourist attraction metro 10 minutes distance main attractions neighborhood options restaurants reasonable hours definitely recommend friends

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel - highly recommend it!”
Reviews.Author: natjones7
Reviews.Content: hotel perfect modern hotel design common artwork walls usually hotels decent sizenot massive plenty suitcases etc immaculate clean worn simple design stylish furniture furnishings reviews staff excellent friendly helpful restaurant reservations etc slight issue checking 2 allocated cleaned didnt matter reception dealt brilliantly efficiently offering free breakfast following day apologise wasnt issue apologetic locationclose marais bastille easy access paris nicest hotels stayed recommend stay

Reviews.Title: “Warm welcome”
Reviews.Author: AGvanderWesthuizen
Reviews.Content: french friendly people change met reception staff le 20 prieure hotel warm welcome management happy speak english helpful cosy elevator breakfast cosy hotel badly located close transport love highly recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “A lovely hotel - typically french with very helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: abi_SouthAfrica
Reviews.Content: partner friend stayed short break paris triple read reviews paris hotels youre idea expect yes adequate 2 night stay beautiful sort wall nice bathroom clean day clean didnt breakfast included rate comment starbucks croissants werent available bought day travel card moving city using subways busses hotel super close main tourist attractions easy paris expensive prepared spend lot money coke €4 yes wonderful eiffel tower especially sparkling lights night attractions paris offer staff hotel helpful helped restaurant suggestions giving directions helped print flight info heading airport thank nice short break paris reasonable cost hotel job

Reviews.Content: booked triple weekend total cost 270 euro couldnt stay price arrival metro corner oberkampf station 5 minute walk max met clean bright warm reception friendly english speaking receptionist couldnt helpful shame complain warm 3 found unbearably hot night uncomfortable sleep times negative enjoyed stay plus cleanliness top rate stayed 4 star irish hotel weekend parisien jewel miles ahead irish stay contemporary decor throughout lift floors breakfast helpful staff offered book taxis airport recommendations local eateries access pc printer print boarding tickets journey home location fab minus hot
